channel.title: Suggestions
channel.description: Use this forum for suggestions you may have for the XenBase framework or any style from Pixel Exit

item.title: Mega Menu
item.author: invalid@example.com (Alfa1)
item.dc:creator: Alfa1
item.content:encoded:
The default XF navigation is not suited for sites with a lot of addons, links and several levels deep links. IMO it does not function well for such situations and also looks outdated.
My members are very confused over the vast number of tabs we have.

I would very much like to have a mega menu for desktop and tablet users. This could be included in xenbase but for one of my non-xenbase custom skins I would like to have it as well.

item.title: Moderator CP?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Blizzard098)
item.dc:creator: Blizzard098
item.content:encoded:
I was thinking that those who are forum moderators or super moderators, should be allowed to access a panel that is similar to the AdminCP, but contains mod-friendly buttons such as ban user, edit profile, etc. I got this idea for Xenforo from MyBB's Moderator CP. I understand that mods can simply go to a profile and do stuff, but it would be more easy and friendly to have an entire control panel dedicated to those who are super mods / forum mods.
